attributes.action: Ban the manufacture of all non biodegradable plastic packaging and replace with plastic made from renewable sources
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make all plastic packaging e.g bottles carrier bags e.t.c out of renewable sources. It will cut non biodegradable waste being put in the general waste system severly and save money in recycling, the process will also be carbon neutral and help towards britains target of cutting co2 emmisions as the plastic is made from renewable sources.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban the manufacture of all non biodegradable plastic packaging and replace with plastic made from renewable sources."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
